description: He is the Secretary General of the GOTT and head of the GU Economic Dept. Despite the fact that he`s a Nouvlesse, Chevalier is a key figure to Éclair`s past and her forgotten former lives. In his lifetime, he has never forgotten Éclair and is always willing to help her. He worked his way up to his current position all for Eclair`s sake (it is revealed late in the show that Chevalier is Éclair`s adopted son).
name: Chevalier d`Autriche
